name: Angels & Orcs Online
description:
Come Join Alkanov and hundreds of other players in the Addictive Massively-Multiplayer Role Playing Game in the Google Play Store for FREE !

*Add friends with the Friend list

*Chat with players* Join the official Discord server now ----> https://discord.gg/qCJk8Hr

*Trade with players, Become A MILLIONAIRE!

*Farm, farm, FARM for levels until you reach maximum and stand at the top!

*PVP coming soon !

*Join the forums and meet players ---> forums.angelsandorcsonline.com
